name: NumberInput
description: Number Input to create an input with a formatted number
note: This requires RN67 to work on Android.

props.name: initialValue
props.description: A valid number (in en locale, i.e. only digits and a decimal point).

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback that is called when the number value has changed (undefined in both if the user has deleted the number).

props.name: leadingTextTypography
props.description: The typography of the leading text

props.name: trailingTextTypography
props.description: The typography of the trailing text

props.name: marginLeft
props.description: The margin to the left of the input

props.name: marginRight
props.description: The margin to the right of the input
